query.statement: SELECT A.MANDT, A.REQNO AS QTNUM, A.LGORT, SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(A.MANDT, A.LGORT) AS LGORTNM, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.UPN) > 5 THEN A.UPN ELSE CS001.MA_PSPID END AS UPN, A.POSID, A.POSID2, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.POSID) > 5 THEN CS101.CS101_HNA ELSE A.POSID END AS HNA, A.REQDATE, A.BUSSI, A.REQKIND, A.MATNR, CASE WHEN VALUE(A.QTNUM, '') > '' THEN CS002.MAKTX ELSE MM011.MAKTX END AS MAKTX, MM011.MEINS, A.MENGE, -- CASE WHEN VALUE(A.QTNUM, '') > '' THEN CS002.AMOUNT * 100 / A.MENGE -- ELSE DECODE(SUBSTR(A.BWTAR, 2), 'A', MM011.SAMT1 * 100, 'B', INT(MM011.SAMT1 * 100 * 0.4)) -- END AS NETPR, -- CASE WHEN VALUE(A.QTNUM, '') > '' THEN CS002.AMOUNT * 100 -- ELSE A.MENGE * DECODE(SUBSTR(A.BWTAR, 2), 'A', MM011.SAMT1 * 100, 'B', INT(MM011.SAMT1 * 100 * 0.4)) -- END AS NETWR, -- CASE WHEN VALUE(A.QTNUM, '') > '' THEN CS002.AMOUNT * 100 -- ELSE A.MENGE * DECODE(SUBSTR(A.BWTAR, 2), 'A', MM011.SAMT1 * 100, 'B', INT(MM011.SAMT1 * 100 * 0.4)) -- END AS AMOUNT, CASE WHEN VALUE(A.QTNUM, '') > '' THEN CS002.AMOUNT * 100 / CS002.MENGE ELSE DECODE(SUBSTR(A.BWTAR, 2), 'A', MM011.SAMT1 * 100, 'B', INT(MM011.SAMT1 * 100 * 0.4)) END AS NETPR, CASE WHEN VALUE(A.QTNUM, '') > '' THEN CS002.NETPR * 100 * A.MENGE ELSE A.MENGE * DECODE(SUBSTR(A.BWTAR, 2), 'A', MM011.SAMT1 * 100, 'B', INT(MM011.SAMT1 * 100 * 0.4)) END AS NETWR, CASE WHEN VALUE(A.QTNUM, '') > '' THEN CS002.NETPR * 100 * A.MENGE ELSE A.MENGE * DECODE(SUBSTR(A.BWTAR, 2), 'A', MM011.SAMT1 * 100, 'B', INT(MM011.SAMT1 * 100 * 0.4)) END AS AMOUNT, CASE WHEN A.REQKIND IN ('9','H') THEN 'FM' ELSE 'ºÎÇ°' END AS RGBNNM FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT031 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST001 AS CS001 ON A.MANDT = CS001.MANDT AND A.QTNUM = CS001.QTNUM AND A.SEQ = CS001.SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST002 AS CS002 ON A.MANDT = CS002.MANDT AND A.QTNUM = CS002.QTNUM AND A.SEQ = CS002.SEQ AND A.SEQNO = CS002.SEQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON A.MANDT= MM011.MANDT AND A.MATNR = MM011.MATNR AND A.MTART = MM011.MTART LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 AS CS101 ON A.MANDT = CS101.MANDT AND SUBSTR(A.POSID, 1, 6) = CS101.CS101_PJT AND SUBSTR(A.POSID, 7) = CS101_HNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND REQNO = #REQNO# FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
